item.title: CVE-2023-23890|2024-08-02T10:42:26.809Z -- lj%20apps -- wp%20airbnb%20review%20slider
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in LJ Apps WP Airbnb Review Slider plugin <=Â 3.2 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-35630|2024-08-02T03:14:53.463Z -- lj%20apps -- wp%20tripadvisor%20review%20slider
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in LJ Apps WP TripAdvisor Review Slider allows Blind SQL Injection.This issue affects WP TripAdvisor Review Slider: from n/a through 12.6.
